title: The RevPi has a strange new Raspberry Pi
description:
Thanks to Revolution Pi for sending this RevPi Connect S along with the Compute Module 4S.

Go check out their industrial computing products: https://revolutionpi.com

Also mentioned in this video:

  - Why are Industrial Pis so expensive? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9MqJI_F-sz8
  - Compute Module 4S product page: https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-4s/

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geerlingguy
Sponsor me on GitHub: https://github.com/sponsors/geerlingguy
Merch: https://redshirtjeff.com
2nd Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/GeerlingEngineering

#RaspberryPi

Contents:

00:00 - Revolution Pi's problem - no Pis!
00:43 - Compute Module 4, with an S
02:27 - Delidded, accidentally
03:26 - A drop-in replacement (mostly)
03:51 - DIN-rail industrial computer
04:39 - The biggest downside
